DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy single dose ( 2 inhalation , 180 mcg total ) Albuterol SPIROMAX ( 90 mcg per inhalation ) versus placebo patient EIB .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Albuterol SPIROMAX® Adult Adolescent Patients With Exercise-Induced Bronchoconstriction ( EIB )
DOC.detailed_description: This study single-dose , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 2-treatment , 2-sequence , 2-way crossover , multicenter study patient document history EIB , without underlie asthma . Each patient participate study approximately 5 week . Each patient complete 2 screen visit ( SV1 SV2 ) , 2 treatment visit ( TV1 TV2 ) , follow-up telephone call ( FV ) .
DOC.criteria: Informed consent/assent : For patient 18 50 year age , inclusive , write informed consent sign dated patient conduct study related procedure review Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act 1996 ( HIPAA ) authorization ; patient 12 17 year age , inclusive , write informed consent sign dated parent/legal guardian write assent sign dated patient conduct study related procedure review HIPAA authorization . Male female patient 12 50 year age , inclusive , SV1 . If female , currently pregnant , breastfeeding , attempt become pregnant , negative serum pregnancy test , nonchildbearing potential . Documented history EIB , without underlie asthma . The underlying asthma must wellcontrolled ( investigator 's judgment ) per National Asthma Education Prevention Program , Expert Panel Report ( NAEPP , EPR3 ) . Other criterion apply . Requires rescue bronchodilator follow exercise challenge SV1 decrease FEV1 return within 20 % preexercise challenge FEV1 within 30 minute administration rescue medication . Pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant donate gamete ( ova sperm ) vitro fertilization study period 30 day patient 's last study relate visit ( eligible patient onlyif applicable ) . Participation investigational drug trial within 30 day precede SV1 plan participation another investigational drug trial time trial . A known hypersensitivity albuterol excipients formulation . History severe milk protein allergy . History respiratory infection disorder ( include , limited bronchitis , pneumonia , otitis medium , acute chronic sinusitis , influenza , etc ) resolve within 2 week precede SV1 . Other criterion apply .
